name: TwoDots
description:
This game was made for the 5th annual GMTK Game Jam

CONTROLS - Tap

Where to Find Me • Videos • Support Me • Community • Updates

Summary: 

Skedaddle Square is a difficult, high-score driven game about two dots joined together in an attempt of survival.

How to play: 

Tap your finger or click your mouse on the screen.

How does this fit along with the topic:

This fits with the theme Joined Together because both dots are joined together.

A little bit about me :

I make video games and pixel art :D

I also hate itch.io

Credits:

What I use:

Construct 3 - my game making software

Aseprite - my pixel art software

Itch.io - where I post all my games and art

Snip and sketch - my go-to for taking screenshots

Olive - my go-to for converting audio and whatnot video editing

Audicity -how I record audio

Freesound - music and audio
